scripts.install: concurrently "cd ./rmserver/http && npm i" "cd ./rmserver/rqtt && npm i" "cd ./rmviz && npm i"
scripts.server_build: concurrently "cd ./rmserver/http && npm run build" "cd ./rmserver/rqtt && npm run build"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run install" "npm run server_build" "npm run client_build" && cd ~/ && source ./.bashrc
scripts.launch: concurrently "cd ./rmserver/http && npm run start" "cd ./rmserver/rqtt && npm run start"
